AT.name: Pokémon™ X
AT.description: Eine atemberaubende 3D-Welt erwartet dich in Pokémon X, einem Exklusivtitel für den Nintendo 3DS. Du reist darin in die Kalos-Region, ein Land voller Geheimnisse, machst deine ersten Schritte in der nächsten Pokémon-Evolutionsstufe und kannst aus drei neu entdeckten Starter-Pokémon wählen.

AU.name: Pokémon™ X
AU.description: A breathtaking 3D world awaits as you begin your adventure in Pokémon X, exclusively on Nintendo 3DS. Journey to the Kalos Region, a land steeped in mystery, as you take your first steps into the next evolution of Pokémon and choose from three newly discovered starter Pokémon!

BR.name: Pokémon™ X
BR.description: Ande de skate, de bicicleta, e até mesmo monte em um Pokémon enquanto se prepara para as novas aventuras na região de Kalos. O novo tipo de Pokémon, fada, revoluciona as estratégias de batalha e aumenta o número de tipos de Pokémon para um total de 18. Alguns Pokémon podem até megaevoluir durante uma batalha, o que inova todos os padrões de batalha e deixa os confrontos ainda mais emocionantes. Um mundo desconhecido cheio de novas estratégias de batalha, com megaevoluções, Pokémon do tipo fada, supertreinamento e muito mais, está à sua espera. Com o novo sistema de procura de jogadores, também é possível se conectar e comunicar com jogadores ao redor do mundo e próximos a você, no apertar de um botão!* *Para utilizar as funções online, uma conexão de internet banda larga é necessária. Para mais informações, acesse o site support.nintendo.com. Confira o tema inspirado neste jogo, na loja de temas. Basta tocar no ícone no canto superior esquerdo do menu HOME do seu Nintendo 3DS para começar.

BG.name: Pokémon™ X
BG.description: A breathtaking 3D world awaits as you begin your adventure in Pokémon X, exclusively on Nintendo 3DS. Journey to the Kalos Region, a land steeped in mystery, as you take your first steps into the next evolution of Pokémon and choose from three newly discovered starter Pokémon!

BE.name: Pokémon™ X
BE.description: Un monde en 3D à couper le souffle vous attend dans Pokémon X, en exclusivité sur Nintendo 3DS. Voyagez dans la région de Kalos, une terre imprégnée de mystère que vous découvrirez dans la prochaine évolution Pokémon et vous pourrez choisir parmi trois nouveaux Pokémon de départ fraîchement découverts pour commencer votre périple !

CA.name: Pokémon™ X
CA.description: Skate, bike, and even ride a Pokémon as you set out for all-new adventures in the Kalos region. The new Fairy-type shakes up battle strategies and brings the number of Pokémon types up to a total of 18. Some Pokémon can even Mega Evolve while in battle, throwing standard battles out the window in favor of all-out brawls. With Mega Evolutions, Fairy-type Pokémon, Super Training and more, an undiscovered world of new battle strategies awaits. And with the new Player Search System, you can also connect and communicate with players nearby and around the world at the press of a button!* *Broadband Internet access required for online features. For more info, go to support.nintendo.com. Check out the theme inspired by this game in the Theme Shop. Just tap the icon in the upper left corner of your Nintendo 3DS HOME Menu to get started.

ES.name: Pokémon™ X
ES.description: Un impactante mundo en 3D te aguarda en Pokémon X, en exclusiva para Nintendo 3DS. Viaja por la región de Kalos, una tierra de misterio, y da un paso hacia delante en la siguiente evolución de Pokémon. ¡Podrás elegir entre tres nuevos Pokémon iniciales!

FI.name: Pokémon™ X
FI.description: A breathtaking 3D world awaits as you begin your adventure in Pokémon X, exclusively on Nintendo 3DS. Journey to the Kalos Region, a land steeped in mystery, as you take your first steps into the next evolution of Pokémon and choose from three newly discovered starter Pokémon!

Voyagez dans la région de Kalos, une terre imprégnée de mystère que vous découvrirez dans la prochaine évolution Pokémon et vous pourrez choisir parmi trois nouveaux Pokémon de départ fraîchement découverts pour commencer votre périple !

GB.description: A breathtaking 3D world awaits as you begin your adventure in Pokémon X, exclusively on Nintendo 3DS. Journey to the Kalos Region, a land steeped in mystery, as you take your first steps into the next evolution of Pokémon and choose from three newly discovered starter Pokémon!

GR.name: Pokémon™ X
GR.description: A breathtaking 3D world awaits as you begin your adventure in Pokémon X, exclusively on Nintendo 3DS. Journey to the Kalos Region, a land steeped in mystery, as you take your first steps into the next evolution of Pokémon and choose from three newly discovered starter Pokémon!

HK.name: Pokémon X
HK.description: 『Pocket Monsters』系列是玩家化身為Pokémon訓練家，與名為Pokémon的不可思議生物一起冒險的RPG遊戲。 在本次新作『Pokémon X・Y』裡，有著能夠「Mega Evolution」的Pokémon，以及可和Pokémon互動，增進感情的「Pokémon-Amie」等豐富新要素。 ※在『Pokémon X・Y』裡，繁體中文版Nintendo 3DS主機也能夠與其他地區的Nintendo 3DS主機交換Pokémon或進行對戰。 ※『Pokémon X・Y』的遊戲語言可從日文、英文、意大利文、西班牙文、法文、德文、韓文中選擇。 (不包含繁體中文，敬請見諒) 軟體內建之電子使用說明書為繁體中文。

HR.name: Pokémon™ X
HR.description: A breathtaking 3D world awaits as you begin your adventure in Pokémon X, exclusively on Nintendo 3DS. Journey to the Kalos Region, a land steeped in mystery, as you take your first steps into the next evolution of Pokémon and choose from three newly discovered starter Pokémon!

IE.name: Pokémon™ X
IE.description: A breathtaking 3D world awaits as you begin your adventure in Pokémon X, exclusively on Nintendo 3DS. Journey to the Kalos Region, a land steeped in mystery, as you take your first steps into the next evolution of Pokémon and choose from three newly discovered starter Pokémon!

HU.name: Pokémon™ X
HU.description: A breathtaking 3D world awaits as you begin your adventure in Pokémon X, exclusively on Nintendo 3DS. Journey to the Kalos Region, a land steeped in mystery, as you take your first steps into the next evolution of Pokémon and choose from three newly discovered starter Pokémon!

IT.name: Pokémon™ X
IT.description: Un mondo mozzafiato in 3D ti attende in Pokémon X, in esclusiva su Nintendo 3DS. Parti per la regione di Kalos, una terra avvolta dal mistero e muovi i tuoi primi passi nell'evoluzione del mondo Pokémon, scegliendo fra tre Pokémon iniziali appena scoperti!

KR.name: 포켓몬스터 X
KR.description: 「포켓몬스터」 시리즈는 플레이어가 주인공이 되어 신비한 생명체 포켓몬을 모으는 여행을 떠나 포켓몬 도감을 완성하며 성장해 나가는 RPG입니다. 최신작 「포켓몬스터 X・Y」에서는 새로운 형태의 진화인 「메가진화」를 하는 포켓몬이 등장하며, 포켓몬과 교감을 나누고 유대감을 쌓아가는 「포켓파를레」 등의 새로운 요소가 가득합니다.

JP.name: ポケットモンスター X
JP.description: 『ポケットモンスター』シリーズは、プレイヤーが主人公となり、ポケモンという不思議な生き物たちとともに冒険を進める、RPGです。最新作の『ポケットモンスター X･Y』では、「メガシンカ」と呼ばれる新しい進化を遂げるポケモンがいたり、ポケモンと触れ合って絆を深める「ポケパルレ」など、新要素が豊富です。

movies.name: ポケットモンスター X･Y 紹介映像
ポケットモンスター X･Y はじめてのポケモン

LT.name: Pokémon™ X
LT.description: A breathtaking 3D world awaits as you begin your adventure in Pokémon X, exclusively on Nintendo 3DS. Journey to the Kalos Region, a land steeped in mystery, as you take your first steps into the next evolution of Pokémon and choose from three newly discovered starter Pokémon!

LV.name: Pokémon™ X
LV.description: A breathtaking 3D world awaits as you begin your adventure in Pokémon X, exclusively on Nintendo 3DS. Journey to the Kalos Region, a land steeped in mystery, as you take your first steps into the next evolution of Pokémon and choose from three newly discovered starter Pokémon!

LU.name: Pokémon™ X
LU.description: Un monde en 3D à couper le souffle vous attend dans Pokémon X, en exclusivité sur Nintendo 3DS. Voyagez dans la région de Kalos, une terre imprégnée de mystère que vous découvrirez dans la prochaine évolution Pokémon et vous pourrez choisir parmi trois nouveaux Pokémon de départ fraîchement découverts pour commencer votre périple !

MT.name: Pokémon™ X
MT.description: A breathtaking 3D world awaits as you begin your adventure in Pokémon X, exclusively on Nintendo 3DS. Journey to the Kalos Region, a land steeped in mystery, as you take your first steps into the next evolution of Pokémon and choose from three newly discovered starter Pokémon!

MX.name: Pokémon™ X
MX.description: Patina, maneja bicicleta, e incluso monta un Pokémon mientras partes a nuevas aventuras en la región de Kalos. El nuevo tipo Hada revoluciona las estrategias en combate y aumenta el número total de tipos de Pokémon a 18. Algunos Pokémon incluso podrán megaevolucionar mientras estén en combate, transformando combates tradicionales a combates fuera de este mundo. Un mundo desconocido de nuevas estrategias en batalla se abre gracias a la megaevolución, a los Pokémon del tipo Hada, al Superentrenamiento y a muchas cosas más. Y con el nuevo sistema de búsqueda de jugadores (PSS) podrás conectarte y comunicarte con jugadores cercanos y de alrededor del mundo con solo oprimir un botón.* *Necesitas una conexión a internet de banda ancha para poder jugar en línea. Para más información visita support.nintendo.com. Mira el tema inspirado en este juego en la tienda de temas. Simplemente toca el icono en la esquina superior izquierda del menú HOME de tu consola Nintendo 3DS para comenzar.

NL.name: Pokémon™ X
NL.description: Ga op avontuur in een adembenemende 3D-wereld met Pokémon X, alleen voor Nintendo 3DS. Reis af naar de Kalos-regio, een land vol mysterieën, en kies uit drie nieuw ontdekte Pokémon om mee te beginnen.

NZ.name: Pokémon™ X
NZ.description: A breathtaking 3D world awaits as you begin your adventure in Pokémon X, exclusively on Nintendo 3DS. Journey to the Kalos Region, a land steeped in mystery, as you take your first steps into the next evolution of Pokémon and choose from three newly discovered starter Pokémon!

PL.name: Pokémon™ X

PT.name: Pokémon™ X
PT.description: Pokémon X é uma nova aventura Pokémon exclusiva para a Nintendo 3DS. Viaja até à misteriosa região de Kalos e prepara-te para dares os teus primeiros passos na direção da próxima evolução de Pokémon.

RU.name: Pokémon™ X
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Захватывающий трехмерный мир с приключениями ждет вас в игре Pokémon X, представленной эксклюзивно на Nintendo 3DS. Вы отправитесь в регион Kalos — землю, покрытую пеленой тайны, — сделаете первые шаги в игре про покемонов нового поколения, а в качестве первого питомца сможете выбрать одного из трех новых, недавно обнаруженных покемонов!

SE.name: Pokémon™ X
